metadata.title: IBeanThere
metadata.description: Discover local cafes, log your coffee visits, and share your experiences

hero.title: Your Coffee Journey Starts Here
hero.subtitle: Discover cafes, record experiences, share your story

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Powerful tools to enhance your coffee journey

discover.title: Discover
discover.description: Find amazing cafes near you with detailed reviews and ratings

record.title: Record
record.description: Capture moments with photos, notes, and ratings for your journal

share.title: Share
share.description: Connect with coffee lovers and discover new favorites together

stats.title: Join Our Community
stats.subtitle: Thousands of coffee enthusiasts trust us

testimonials.title: Join Thousands of Coffee Enthusiasts
testimonials.subtitle: See what our community is saying about their coffee journey

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Coffee Journey?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of coffee lovers and begin documenting your unique coffee experiences today
cta.disclaimer: "60 beans make a cup of coffee, and they give me 60 good ideas." - Beethoven

auth.welcome_back_subtitle:
Continue your coffee journey and discover
new experiences with fellow coffee enthusiasts.
auth.start_journey_subtitle: Join thousands of coffee enthusiasts and begin documenting your unique coffee experiences.
auth.sign_in_subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account
auth.username_hint: Username must be between 3 and 20 characters, containing only letters, numbers, underscores (_), and hyphens (-), and must start with a letter

map.location_error: Failed to get your location. Please try again.
map.browser_settings_guide: You can change location permission in browser settings
map.location_permission_reason: Location sharing is needed to see trending cafes near you
map.location_permission_denied_hint: Please allow location permission in browser settings. Settings > Privacy > Location Services
map.be_the_navigator: Be the first to discover and share cafes in your area!
map.login_required_to_register: Please sign in to register a cafe

visit.login_required: Please sign in to check in
visit.location_too_far: You must be within 50m of the cafe to check in
visit.already_checked_in_today: You have already checked in today
visit.location_permission_required: Location permission is required for check-in
visit.location_accuracy_low: Location accuracy is too low. Please try again

errors.unknown: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.terms_required: Please agree to the terms and conditions
errors.email_already_exists: An account with this email already exists
errors.weak_password: Password is too weak. Please choose a stronger password
errors.too_many_requests: Too many requests. Please try again later
errors.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
errors.username_invalid_chars: Only letters, numbers, underscores (_), and hyphens (-) allowed

admin.dashboard_subtitle: Manage pending cafes and verify community submissions
admin.pending_cafes_description: Review and verify cafes waiting for approval
admin.confirm_verify_message: Are you sure you want to verify this cafe? This will mark it as verified and preserve the Founding Crew information.
admin.confirm_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this cafe? This action cannot be undone.

register.title: Register New Cafe
register.postcode_not_found: Location not found for this postcode
register.google_maps_url_placeholder: Paste Google Maps link for reference
register.google_maps_url_hint: This link will be saved for reference only
register.location_permission_required: Location permission is required to register a cafe
register.distance_too_far: You must be within 50m of the cafe to register it
register.distance_too_far_dynamic: You must be within {maxDistance}m of the cafe to register it
register.duplicate_detected: A cafe already exists at this location
register.check_in_instead: Check in to existing cafe instead
register.registration_failed: Failed to register cafe. Please try again.
register.postcode_100m_allowed: Postcode search allows up to 100m distance
register.select_on_map_hint: Click on the map to select cafe location
register.location_accuracy_low_warning: GPS accuracy is low. The address may be approximate. Please verify and edit if needed.
register.address_auto_filled: Address auto-filled from location. You can edit it if needed.
register.address_edit_hint: You can edit this address if it's not accurate
